dempred.datastructure

Class DatasetResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • dempred.datastructure.DatasetResult

  • public class DatasetResult
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class DatasetResult contains various functions to measure the prediction quality of a predicted dataset.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatasetResult()

      static double pcc(Dataset<?> dataset)
      called "linear correlation coefficient" (r) or "Pearson product moment correlation coefficient" (pcc) in case of linear regression: can be squared to get r^2 but not same as "coefficient of determination" in all cases!

      called "linear correlation coefficient" (r) or "Pearson product moment correlation coefficient" (pcc) in case of linear regression: can be squared to get r^2 but not same as "coefficient of determination" in all cases! the transformation is accomplished before the calculation.

        Returns:
        the r2 or q2 error

      • r2q2

        public static double r2q2(Dataset<?> dataset,
          TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
        Calculates the R2q2 value. the transformation is accomplished before the calculation.
        r^2 = coefficient of determination
        Only in case of a linear regression r^2 = pcc^2
        q^2 = same as r2 but computed on loo trainset. r2 is normally on recall. "predictive r2" on test set
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        transformationFunction - the transformation function
        Returns:
        the R2 or Q2 value

      • computeValueMean

        public static double computeValueMean(Dataset<?> dataset)
        Computes the mean of all values of a dataset.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        the double

      • pcc

        public static double pcc(Dataset<?> dataset)
        called "linear correlation coefficient" (r) or "Pearson product moment correlation coefficient" (pcc) in case of linear regression: can be squared to get r^2 but not same as "coefficient of determination" in all cases!
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        the pcc value

      • pcc

        public static double pcc(Dataset<?> dataset,
         TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
        called "linear correlation coefficient" (r) or "Pearson product moment correlation coefficient" (pcc) in case of linear regression: can be squared to get r^2 but not same as "coefficient of determination" in all cases! the transformation is accomplished before the calculation.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        transformationFunction - the transformation function
        Returns:
        the double

        Returns:

      • averageFoldError

        public static double averageFoldError(Dataset<?> dataset)
        Calculates the Average fold error. also called geometric mean fold error which is the geometric mean of the error quotient. geometric mean is defined as: n-th root of the products of the errors.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        Returns:
        the double

      • averageFoldError

        public static double averageFoldError(Dataset<?> dataset,
                      TransformationFunctionInterface transformationFunction)
        Calculates the Average fold error. also called geometric mean fold error which is the geometric mean of the error quotient. geometric mean is defined as: n-th root of the products of the errors. the transformation is accomplished before the calculation.
        Parameters:
        dataset - the dataset
        transformationFunction - the transformation function
        Returns:
        the double

        public static double foldError(Dataset<?> dataset)

        Returns:
        the fold error
